Summary: 4 senior citizen saw flying saucer stop in front of them as they were out at night. It sent spurts of air from its bottom to the ground, stopped and then did it again.
trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Mesa
There was one other sighting in Mesa on or around January 20th 2001
divs: sighting detailsmy husband and i were out for a walk on a cloudy and misty night when an object that looked like a full lighted moon went fast by my side at tree top level. this flat disc that looked larger that a basketball disappeared out of sight. we came to the end of the street and started for our home. suddenly at the corner came a flying saucer headed diagonally to the spot where we had been when this disc crossed our path. the saucer was about 100 to 150 feet away and had lights spaced all around the entire rim with a lighted hump on top. it stopped abruptly when it saw us and sent spurts of air from its bottom to the ground, stopped and then did it again i ran to my neighbors house and got the two of them outside also. the lighted hump on this was delicate and lovely and had balsa like slats making a curved form. in the quiet i could barely hear a very soft hum. i happened to look up at the clouds and there in a small space between two clouds were two very small stick planes standing motionless along side each other and standing on their ends. across and down from the top were long cross sticks the size of 1 to 1\2 inch from my far away view point. as i pointed upward the saucer got mad and sent spurts out its bottom again. as we watched the saucer started rolling over its top toward us and under again into the long shape of a cigar and pointed the front end toward the spot where we had seen the stick planes now covered with clouds. at medium speed it disappeared into the clouds. thinking about it later, perhaps we had seen the protecting shell that would fit on each side of this cigar to enclose it for a trip far away. why didn't we report this to anyone? because we were spooked by what happened next. we went home and went to bed but we felt weird so we went out into our screened in porch and looked up toward the street light. we felt like we were being watched so we dashed in, locked the doors and went to bed. none of us told our family about this but the next day around 10am i went on outlook express to see if we had any e-mail. instead up pops google with a message---"have you ever seen a flying saucer? tell us about your experience". i froze and called my husband. we were concerned and didn't know what to do. we decided only our government could write and send us this message. we must have seen something that we should keep quiet about. we x'd off google and didn't touch the computer until around 2:30 pm when we found this message there again. we clicked it off and the next day it was gone. never before or since have we received such a message. they must have seen my husband go home for the camera so they knew where we live. the camera was out of film because of christmas pictures we had taken. seeing is believing!
